name: Ä°skender Kebab
description: A famous Turkish dish consisting of thinly cut grilled lamb basted with hot tomato sauce over pieces of pita bread and generously slathered with melted sheep butter and yogurt.
steps: Grill seasoned lamb strips until well cooked.
Toast pita bread lightly and cut into small pieces.
Place the bread in a dish and cover with grilled lamb.
Heat tomato sauce and pour over the meat.
Melt butter and drizzle over the dish.
Serve with a side of fresh yogurt.
tips: Ensure the lamb is thinly sliced for quick grilling and authentic taste.
Use freshly made tomato sauce for better flavor.
Serve immediately while hot for best taste.
